title: What type of music is rock and roll? - Quora

response.answer_text: Rock ’n’ Roll music originated in the USA in the late 1940’s and the early part of the 1950’s as an amalgam of Rhythm and Blues, Jazz, Boogie Woogie, Blues, and Country Music although it wasn’t called Rock ’n’ Roll until the mid-50’s when the piano and sax were pretty much replaced by the guitar. At that time is became pretty much based on a 12-bar structure and consisted of simple melodies and a heavy beat using drums, guitars, and bass.
In a nutshell it should be fun above all else.
